original_text: And thou shalt take of the blood of the bullock, and put it upon the horns of the altar with thy finger, and pour all the blood beside the bottom of the altar.
korean_text: 그 피를 네 손가락으로 제단 뿔들에 바르고 그 피 전부를 제단 밑에 쏟을지며

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt take of the blood of the bullock
and put it upon the horns of the altar
and pour all the blood beside the bottom of the altar
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 피를 제단의 밑 옆에 쏟아라
